definitions.definition: The butterfat/milkfat part of milk which rises to the top; this part when separated from the remainder.
definitions.example: Take 100 ml of cream and 50 grams of sugar…

definitions.definition: A yellowish white colour; the colour of cream.
Frosting, custard, creamer or another substance similar to the oily part of milk or to whipped cream.

definitions.example: the cream of the crop;  the cream of a collection of books or pictures

definitions.definition: A viscous aqueous oil/fat emulsion with a medicament added, used to apply that medicament to the skin. (compare with ointment)
definitions.example: You look really sunburnt; you should apply some cream.

definitions.definition: The chrism or consecrated oil used in anointing ceremonies.
To puree, to blend with a liquifying process.
definitions.example: Cream the vegetables with the olive oil, flour, salt and water mixture.

definitions.definition: To turn a yellowish white colour; to give something the color of cream.
To rub, stir, or beat (butter) into a light creamy consistency.
To skim, or take off by skimming, as cream.
To take off the best or choicest part of.
To furnish with, or as if with, cream.
Cream-coloured; having a yellowish white colour.
